project_abstract.cdata: The Infrastructure Privatization Technical Assistance Project aims to: 1) help Government choose structural options for sector reform; 2) develop a sound legal and regulatory framework in support of privatization; 3) reduce, and if possible, eliminate constraints to privatization in sectors covered by the loan; and 4) provide support to the privatization preparation process. Project activities will include: 1) hiring consultants to assist in the analysis of sector structure, the development of strategic options, policies and regulations; 2) hiring consultants to design and participate in the privatization process; 3) financing participation in training programs and other human resource development activities; and 4) procurement of necessary software, hardware and related equipment.
